name: Pensionskassernes Administration A/S
membership: Forsikring og Pension, Energy Solutions, IIGCC
goal: PKA administrates pensions for app. 300.000 members in Denmark. The members primarily work within the healthcare sector. PKA is a jointly owned administration company for three pension funds. As well as aiming to create member value PKA also invests in projects and assets, which have high environmental, social and governance standards.
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives:
Pensionsanliggender: Solvens II
Finansiel regulering: EMIR, climate policies, long term investment and capital market union.
